headline: Does 3M’s Recent 28% Rally Still Offer Value After Legal Settlement Progress?
summary: Wondering if 3M's stock is a hidden gem or already priced to perfection? You're in the right place for a clear, no-nonsense look at its value story. 3M's share price is up an impressive 28.3% year-to-date, and has delivered a 32.1% return over the past year, but it has dipped 3.0% in just the last week. This highlights the kind of swings that keep investors guessing. Recent market buzz around 3M has centered on its strategic moves, including progress on legal settlements and reports of the...
